title: Sorted Wallet
genericError: Wani abu ya faru. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
loggedOut: An fita da ku, da fatan za a sake shiga.

offline.title: Kuna layi
offline.text: Da alama akwai matsala game da haɗin ku. Da fatan za a duba haɗin yanar gizon ku.

signup.title: Yi rijista
signup.passwordLength: Tsawon kalmar sirri ba zai iya zama ƙasa da haruffa 5 ba.
signup.instructions1: Sorted Wallet zai aiko muku da lambar wucewa ta lokaci ɗaya don tabbatar da adireshin imel ɗin ku.
signup.instructions2: Da fatan za a shigar da lambar lambobi 6 da aka aika zuwa

login.title: Shiga
login.instructions1: Wallet ɗin da aka ware zai aiko muku da lambar lokaci ɗaya don tabbatar da lambar wayar ku.
login.instructions2: Shigar da lambar lambobi 6 da aka aika zuwa {phone}

setupPIN.title: Ƙirƙiri lambar fil ɗin ku
setupPIN.instructions1: Da fatan za a tuna da shi kuma kiyaye shi don ma'amalar walat na gaba.

errors.required: Da fatan za a shigar da lambar fil na lamba.
errors.match: Fitin da aka shigar bai dace ba
errors.length: Pin dole ne ya kasance tsakanin lambobi 3 zuwa 7

intro.title: Barka da zuwa Sorted Wallet
intro.sub: Shiga ko Yi rijista don ci gaba.

gasFees.title: Kayyade wuta
gasFees.body: Wannan girman za a buɗe {type} {gas} a cikin kayyade wuta.

contacts.title: Mutanen naku
contacts.name: Suna
contacts.saveRequest: Kuna so ku sake hannuwan wannan adireshi gaba daya?

tac.error: Da fatan za a yarda da Sharuɗɗan & Sharuɗɗa!
